Text:
Nice. Thanks!

Only one season, though (season 3, 18 episodes).

Not "season 1-7" as stated. 

We can hope for more uploads(?)...

You are wrong. It is season 1- 7.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0920489/

You are correct. I presumed that there were more than 2 or 4 episodes per season. In US television there are typically 12 episodes per season (give or take a few).

Italians believe in quality, not quantity?!
Thanks v much anonymous!  A10 V9 - subs 10 and no messing to merge them to the avi file. Will keep seeding this.
thank you for this awesome rel; i'll keep it and seed it.

I reorganized the contents of this torrent, since the original torrent had 18 folders with only cryptic one word titles, then some files within the folders didn't have episode numbers. So I removed all the folders and looked up episode numbers (according to IMDB, 2 were mislabeled in the original torrent).

Still, w/o the original upload above by anonymous, none of this would have been possible- and it looks like a good series.

new torrent at http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7162038

This is good work, especially as the recent upload by Anon [M Es1-10] appears to be already dead! Contrary to what is said here this torrent appears to contain 18 Episodes [from the 22 made to date]. All are good quality with fairly quick down. This is a treasure and the scripts, photography and music are all a delight!!
